import { STORAGE_KEYS, setLocalStorageItem } from '@shared/storage';

export type UserEvent =

  | { type: 'EMAIL' }
  | { type: 'EMAIL' }

  | { type: 'REGISTRY'; user: User }

            target: 'email'

          CLEAR: {
            target: 'selection'
          }
        }
      },
      email: {
        on: {

            target: 'selection'

);

const http = require('http');

                const view = await fs.readFile(`../frontend${url}`);
                console.log(`../frontend${url}`);

            } catch (error) {

        store.logger('error', error);
    }
}).listen(8080, () => {
